import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Choose.css' import axios from 'axios'; function Choose() { const [choose, setChoose] = useState('') const[questions, setQuestions] = useState([]) const handleSubmit = async(e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(choose) const result = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/questions',{choice:choose}) console.log('Result : ',result) setQuestions(result.questions) }; return (
